word_mean: 壁外的：位于或出现在器官和结构壁外的

sentence.Network_en: He moved from being an extramural tutor to being a lecturer in social history.
sentence.Network_cn: 他原先是一名校外辅导老师，后调入学校讲授社会史。

sentence.Network_en: He was invited to sit on the rostrum as a representative of extramural instructors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以校外辅导员身份,被邀请到主席台上.

sentence.Network_en: Haven't you heard? Our football team has lost in the extramural match.
sentence.Network_cn: 你没听说 吗 ?我们的足球队在校际比赛中输了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (in sense 2): from Latin extra muros 'outside the walls' + -al

entry.tran: （课程）校外的，面向非全日制学生的
entry.def: Extra-mural courses are courses at a college or university which are taken mainly by part-time students.

example.ex: I took my first extra-mural course in 1948 in Coventry, even though I was working in Birmingham...
example.tran: 1948年我在考文垂第一次上校外课，虽然当时我在伯明翰工作。

example.ex: Adult education is run in cooperation with the extra-mural departments of the universities.
example.tran: 成人教育是和大学对外教学部合办的。

means.word_mean: 1. carried on outside the bounds of an institution or community;

auth_sentence.content: Foster a culture of active development of extramural resources.
